Title: Class Enemy

Actors: Igor Samobor, Natasa Barbara Gracner, Tjasa Zeleznik, Masa Derganc
Plot: Relations between the students and the new teacher of German are extremely tense. When one female student commits suicide, her schoolmates blame the teacher for her death. An awareness that...
